content: Alright, deal! Oh, and this mattock might come in handy for you. I mean... just be careful out there.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3
访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: *ahem* Now's not the time for chit-chat. When you're lost, the first step is to find the correct heading and the route you need to take. {A远眺}Do you remember which direction you came from?
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3
访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: His ears start twitching even more.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Treasure? Can I join in?
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: And if I break anything of yours along the way... {A加油}don't worry! I'll make it up to you, no matter what. I'll take on any job you give me!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: So just now... that was an accident. Yep. {短暂停} Anyway, what I'm looking for is...{A想象} something that's gentler than the evening breeze, and shinier than gold!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: This is my planet.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: A reward, huh? {A挑衅坏笑}How about I split my luck with you fifty-fifty? *ahem* Just kidding. I'll make sure your reward is worth it.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: This is my planet.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A豆豆眼}<style=SizeBig>Huuuuh?</style><style=SizeSmall>Treasure... You don't mean me, do you?</style>
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: If anything comes up, just let me know. I'll be waiting for your good news. <ruby:Thanks>Asante sana</ruby>!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Then it's settled! If anything comes up, just let me know. I'll be waiting for your good news. <ruby:Thanks>Asante sana</ruby>!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: How did you get stuck up in that tree?
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3
访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: I'm <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Once every fifteen years... Without it, life just feels, {A期待搓手}well,{短暂停} <style=SizeBig>incomplete</style>.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: *ahem* Well, you see, I was chasing something really important. Chased it the whole way here — across Islets, down cliffs, up that tree... {A心虚目移}And then... well, you shook me down.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Y-You mean this is <style=SizeBig>your "territory"</style>?! {A抱歉}*ahem* Sorry... I didn't realize... that was rude of me.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: So what happens when you find it?
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3
访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: That's wonderful! With you on my side, we've got this in the bag! {A看我的}And the reward... Don't you worry, I'll cook up something real nice.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: You notice the person's ears twitch as they stand before you.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Th-Thanks? That's the magic of brute force... Wait a sec! {A虎啸}You're not...{短暂停} <style=SizeBig>a lost traveler</style>, are you?
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A拒绝}It's dangerous being lost on a planet like this all alone!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: So, I might have to stick around your territory for a bit... I'll scour every blade of grass and every tree branch if that's what it takes. I have to find it.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: But, *ahem* this is your turf, so you call the shots! {A思考}Let's see...{短暂停} first we'll <style=Highlight>shake some trees for fruit</style>, then maybe <style=Highlight>chop a few trees</style>, gather some <style=Highlight>wildgrass</style>...
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Your ears have a life of their own!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: I've met plenty of lost folks while exploring new planets, so I guess I just assumed... Sorry about that. I'm <style=NpcName>Msafiri</style>, by the way.
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: No problem, just leave it to me!
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: *ahem* You mean... you wanna come along? But that thing...{短暂停} it might, uh, probably isn't much use to you?
info: 访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3
访客萨飞里-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3
